LanguageData.FakeRatkinTail.label: fake Ratkin tail
LanguageData.FakeRatkinTail.description: It is a fake Ratkin tail made by twisting a fabric. The tail of the Ratkin is responsible for the balance. It is hard to balance because it does not move anyhow, but it looks better than nothing.
LanguageData.FakeRatkinEar.label: fake Ratkin ear
LanguageData.FakeRatkinEar.description: Fake Ratkin ears made of cloth. The big ears of the Ratkin are not only a sound but also a symbol and have great significance in the Ratkin society.
LanguageData.BionicTail.label: bionic Ratkin tail
LanguageData.BionicTail.description: An advanced artificial Ratkin tail. It also has a small AI that automatically balances the user's missing.
